title: Domain adaption of vehicle detector based on convolutional neural networks
authors: X Li, M Ye, M Fu, P Xu, T Li - …  Journal of Control, Automation and Systems
excerpt: Abstract Generally the performance of a vehicle detector will decrease rapidly, when it is trained on a fixed training set but applied to a specific scene with view changes. The reason is that in the training set only a few samples are helpful for vehicle detection in the specific  ...
